howIAm.title: Who I am
howIAm.description:
I am able to achieve a wide range of complex and scalable projects.

My responsibilities are: 
understanding the business problem, 
converting it into an architecture, 
transforming the architecture into a solution, 
testing the solution, and deploying it.

items.title: Frontend Lead
items.description:
As part of the development team of Devbase, I participated in three projects aimed at growing the technological services of startups. 

Teamwork - Senior Frontend 
I was responsible for cooperating with the construction company of online services, showing its clients its services
using React as technology and implementing it in AWS.
In addition, I developed the designs proposed by the UX/UI team and tested it together with the project manager and QA.
Finally, we launched the product successfully.

Zuro - Technical Leader
I was responsible for innovating technology stack for the transaction of money between companies, the transfer of an already created architecture, continuing with the product that had already been assembled and taking it to the stage and production environments. 
Preparing the product for commercial production involved working closely with the client. 

Tandym - Senior Frontend 
I was responsible for understanding the idea of tandym and providing the tools for creating the payment method. 
This architecture was based on AWS services, with Frontend and Backend as a Docker images in AWS clusters. 
Using these tools together with the Frontend and Backend team, we have created a payment method available for different platforms, verifying the correct operation step by step and according to product planning, we went to commercial production on time. 

Technology stack: Node.js, Nestjs, Nextjs, React, Redux, JavaScript, Typescript, AWS, Docker, Github, CI/CD, MySql, Prisma.

items.title: Senior Frontend
items.description:
My responsibility was being a connection between Designers and Developers. One of my tasks was to communicate my knowledge about the software, design and user experience. For this, I participated in disscusions to agree upon the easiest and best approach to handle the Technology stack and best architect model. 

React, Redux, TypeScript, StyleComponents, Figma, Sketch, Jira, SCRAM

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description:
Solution thinker and provider. With my engineering capabilities complex projects in the Financial industry will be brought to life. In internal projects client identifying data will be processed. To fulfill the requirents of these projects, applications and multiple languages are used like: 

React, Redux, Node, JS, Styles CSS // Sass with styled components, API REST.

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description:
Maintaining the design and functionality of e-commerce. The business was located in United States of America. Projects were realized with the following companies: Ascena Group, Stadium Goods, Children Place. The following technologies were used for the projects: 

HTML5, CSS3, JS, AJAX, JQuery, Sass, Node.js, Express, React, Redux, OOP, Functional Programming, Jira, CMS, Webpack, Grunt.
 Some examples of my work with Eulas: 
  https://www.louandgrey.com/ 
 https://www.anntaylor.com/ 
 Kaban and Scrum as agile working methods are used in the projects above.

items.title: Engineering, System Engineering
items.description: 3 semesters of studies to reach the engineering degree. The content of the studies were programming algorithms, functions, algebra, physics, fundamentals of engineering.

items.title: Web Development, Frontend Web Developer
items.description: Creation and design of web pages with HTML5, JS, CSS, bootstrap, jquery, APIs, animations. As self-educated person I improved my professional skills.

items.title: Rev Earth
items.description: As part of its awareness-raising mission, Rev Earth facilitates connections between people

items.title: CRM Seller
items.description: This system allows companies to add, delete, and manage their sellers. As for the sellers, they can add, delete, and manage the products of the company and the customers.

items.title: Unbeatable Tic-Tac-Toe
items.description:
You! Beat it! 
 Unbeatable Tic-Tac-Toe game using AI will try to beat you! Tecnologies: React and Minimax Algorithm and Alpha Beta.
